Victim Details.name: Reginald Pembroke
Victim Details.cause of death: single bullet wound to the chest

Suspects.name: Mrs. White
Suspects.statement: I was in the kitchen preparing dinner at 9 PM. I didn't leave until 10 PM when Mr. Parker asked me to bring him a glass of wine.

Suspects.name: James Parker
Suspects.statement: I was in my room, working on some business documents, from 8:30 PM onwards. I didn't hear or see anything unusual.

Suspects.name: Emily Pembroke
Suspects.statement: I was in the garden, taking a walk to clear my head, at around 9:15 PM. I saw nothing suspicious.

Suspects.name: Thomas Brown
Suspects.statement: I was in the attic, doing some cleaning and organizing, from 8:45 PM until Mr. Pembroke's death.

Killer.name: James Parker
Killer.method: single bullet wound to the chest
